Topics.Name: Pjesma 1
Topics.Description: Daniel Dumile ,najpoznatiji pod svojim umjetničkim imenom MF Doom ili jednostavno DOOM, bio je Britansko-američki reper i producent. Poznat po svojoj zamršenoj igri riječi, prepoznatljivoj metalnoj maski i superzlikovcu na pozornici, Dumile je postao glavna figura underground hip hopa.

Topics.Name: Pjesma 2
Topics.Description: Filip Motovunski je drum and bass/jungle/hip hop DJ i producent iz malog gradića Motovuna u Istri. Prije više od 10 godina počeo je kao producent beatova, tekstopisac i MC u svojem PCP bandu kojeg je dijelio s Ivanom Babićem iz Motovuna.

Topics.Name: Pjesma 3
Topics.Description: Jam Baxter je engleski reper iz Londona, UK. Od 2009. izdao je 7 solo albuma i nekoliko EP-a za izdavače High Focus Records sa sjedištem u Velikoj Britaniji, a od 2019. Blah Records. Poznat je po svojim nadrealnim i zagonetnim tekstovima, koji su različito opisivani kao neobični

Topics.Name: Song 1
Topics.Description: Daniel Dumile, best known by his stage name MF Doom or simply DOOM, was a British-American rapper and producer. Known for his intricate wordplay, signature metal mask and on-stage supervillain, Dumile has become a staple of underground hip hop.

Topics.Name: Song 2
Topics.Description: Filip Motovunski is a drum and bass/jungle/hip hop DJ and producer from the small town of Motovun in Istria. More than 10 years ago, he started as a beat producer, songwriter and MC in his PCP band, which he shared with Ivan Babić from Motovun.

Topics.Name: Song 3
Topics.Description: Jam Baxter is an English rapper from London, UK. Since 2009 he has released 7 solo albums and several EPs on UK-based High Focus Records and since 2019 Blah Records. He is known for his surreal and enigmatic lyrics , which have been variously described as unusual
